title: Project: Yasuo Visual update NEEDED!
body:
Compare the two skins, both the original yasuo skin and the High moon yasuo skin, they both look great, so does Project yasuo, but when project yasuo gains two stacks on his q (to launch his whirlwind) the circle radius looks extremely out-dated, can you fix this? It has made me come back to the original skin, even though I've bought the project yas skin.

Fix it please? Just replace the circle radius of the whirlwind to make it look like more of the original skin's radius and maybe the high noon's radius. But instead of a blue or orange circle, make the project yasuo's circle red or something, I'd really appreciate it and I think alot of other yasuo mains would like this to be updated aswell.

replies.body:
Hey Kim Johnny Un,

I've gone ahead and taken a look at these visuals - they're working as intended. PROJECT: Yasuo's particle is a bit more stylized than the other skins, as both base Yasuo and High Noon Yasuo have nearly identical particles.

the skin needs a visual update though its the worst one out of all the other project skins it felt like a lazy output by riot from some random solo project it looks nothing like the other project skins it feels a bit clunky and the feel is some random guy walking round in a giant iron pot

It's because it came out a long time ago, and Riot added a chain of new PROJECT: skins to get people to spend RP on them but tbh I agree he needs a visual update, in his loading screen card+in-game animations and character look. Oh yeah, and I do not like his AA animation, why is it so different from all the other Yasuo skins anyway? It doesn't feel as clean as the slash-through animation that all the other skins.
The skin is really underwhelming. I bought it long ago but once I had 2 matches with it I came back to base skin.
Can we have pictures??? (would help a lot)
